name: Super Pepe and the Attack of the Pixions
name_original: Super Pepe and the Attack of the Pixions
description:
Can you survive the bullet hell of this retro shoot em up?

The evil invaders called Pixions have kidnapped the children of Super Pepe and the worst, they have taken the game console and the gamepad!

Can you help him recover them?

Aim, shoot and destroy to test your skills and prove your mastery in this video game inspired by the classic shoot them up games of the 80s and 90s.

Features:

- 20 levels divided in 5 worlds 

- 5 terrible Bosses

- 4 Power-ups to increase destruction

- 5 different type of weapons 

- Lots of enemies

- Explosions and more explosions!!

- Bluetooth controller support

- Cloud save through Google Play Services.
